== Main Inclusion Report for Smeg ==

=== Requirements ===

1. ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/smeg/, builds on all platforms.

2. ''Rationale:'' Smeg is quite popular and is the probable default menu editor for breezy

3. ''Security:'' No CVEs or other security issues

4. ''Quality assurance:''  
** No major bugs known, no upstream bug tracker

5. ''Standards compliance:''
** Standard `cdbs` packaging.
** FHS met.
** Debian policy met.

6. ''Dependencies:''
** all in main
